page.title: 14THE FALCON INN
page.content: Mr and Mrs Joyce have run the Falcon Inn from 1970.It is very busy in the summer with tourists,but very quiet in the winter when the best nights are Monday and Sunday.Beer garden,and childrens bar are popular in the summer.The most popular adult drink is Bass,and childrens drink Pepsi.Two arcade games are provided.The inn has 16 rooms,and is popular after cricket and football.Food is served and the kitchen has a good reputation.The pub is called the Falcon because Catholic Priests persecuted in Elizabethan times came to the Inn to say Mass.Falcons were released as a signal to the Catholic community. It is a very attrative pub with its well kept gardens,which employs a number of local people in the summer.
